content:
As an AI language model, I do not have preferences like humans do. However, here are some popular brands and stores that offer a range of sizes and styles for different body types:

1. Athleta: This brand offers a wide variety of women's athletic wear, including plus-sizes and petite options. 2. Nike: Nike provides a range of sizes and styles for men and women, including extended sizes and athletic wear for plus-size women. 3. Lululemon: Besides offering athletic wear for men and women, Lululemon has a wide range of legging lengths and sizes, making it easier for shorter and taller individuals to find the right fit. 4. Old Navy: Old Navy has an extensive selection of workout clothes for men and women in a range of sizes and styles. 5. Under Armour: This brand offers workout clothes for men and women, including plus-size options and a wide range of styles. These are just a few examples, and there are many other great brands and stores out there that cater to different body types.
